messages.title: My Pledges
messages.content: Straight talking politics: I will be honest about where I stand on key issues such as Brexit. Ending the gravy train: Unlike Sir Graham Brady, I won't employ family members on £40k+. No second jobs: Sir Graham Brady has multiple jobs - if elected I will be a full time MP. Keeping in touch: I will keep you updated on my work and hold regular advice surgeries. Openness and transparency: I will publish my expense claims online for all residents to see.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will be honest about where I stand on key issues such as Brexit.
Unlike Sir Graham Brady, I won't employ family members on £40k+.
Sir Graham Brady has multiple jobs - if elected I will be a full time MP.
I will keep you updated on my work and hold regular advice surgeries.
I will publish my expenses claims online for all residents to see.
